author: Sophie Michell
method: Heat the oil in a pan and gently fry the onion for 3-4 minutes, until softened. Add the chopped sausage and greens, and gently fry for a further 3-4 minutes.  Tip the canned tomatoes into a food processor and blend until smooth. Add to the pan and bring to a gentle simmer, and cook for 3-4 minutes. Stir through the dill. Serve in a bowl, topped with a spoon of the Greek-style yoghurt.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red onion, finely chopped,  200g/7oz German sausage, skin removed, chopped,  ½ head spring greens, shredded,  1 x 400g/14¼oz can tomatoes,  2 tbsp chopped fresh dill,  1 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt
